医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
医疗保险参与者现在可以转换保险范围。以下是新内容和需要考虑的内容。当商店开始提供万圣节糖果和流感疫苗时，消费者就知道秋天到了——广播和邮箱里充斥着医疗保险选项的广告。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Medicare-enrollees-can-switch-coverage-now-Heree28099s-whate28099s-new-and-what-to-consider.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Medicare-enrollees-can-switch-coverage-now-Heree28099s-whate28099s-new-and-what-to-consider.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a3c25fdf-2fd4-4987-a0cf-3d6c301d7c1f Mon, 16 Oct 2023 07:50:38 -0400 Medicare enrollees can switch coverage now. Here’s what’s new and what to consider.
医生放弃了用来证明警察拘留死亡合理性的诊断。无论如何，它可能会继续存在。在 2019 年科罗拉多州以利亚·麦克莱恩 (Elijah McClain) 和 2020 年明尼苏达州乔治·弗洛伊德 (George Floyd) 被警察高调杀害之前，布鲁克斯·沃尔什 (Brooks Walsh) 并没有质疑“兴奋性谵妄综合症”是否是一种合法的医学诊断。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Doctors-abandon-a-diagnosis-used-to-justify-police-custody-deaths-It-might-live-on-anyway.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Doctors-abandon-a-diagnosis-used-to-justify-police-custody-deaths-It-might-live-on-anyway.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=71089c16-dd8f-4da1-a21d-4d230a9f8c7a Mon, 16 Oct 2023 07:46:27 -0400 Doctors abandon a diagnosis used to justify police custody deaths. It might live on, anyway.
三分之一的学校没有护士。这就是为什么这是一个问题。弗吉尼亚州亚历山大市威廉·拉姆齐小学的学校护士乔迪·博比特随时准备着看望患有各种损伤和疾病的儿童。开学第一周的一天，游行在第一声钟声响起前开始，一个小女孩带着红红的、恼怒的眼睛走了进来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/A-third-of-schools-done28099t-have-a-nurse-Heree28099s-why-thate28099s-a-problem.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/A-third-of-schools-done28099t-have-a-nurse-Heree28099s-why-thate28099s-a-problem.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f01ed866-3702-4e59-8051-735532dd2e22 Mon, 16 Oct 2023 07:44:07 -0400 A third of schools don’t have a nurse. Here’s why that’s a problem.
AI创新“鲟鱼”改变中枢神经系统恶性肿瘤分类Sturgeon 是一种与患者无关的转移学习神经网络，可实现中枢神经系统恶性肿瘤的分子亚分类。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/AI-innovation-Sturgeon-transforms-pediatric-brain-tumor-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/AI-innovation-Sturgeon-transforms-pediatric-brain-tumor-surgery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cedbbc7f-29b2-4e88-9882-b26a1f886e47 Mon, 16 Oct 2023 06:13:00 -0400 AI innovation "Sturgeon" transforms classification of central nervous system malignancies
草药、香料和膳食纤维能否为患有肠易激综合症 (IBS) 的儿童提供有效的治疗选择？香料、膳食纤维和草药对肠易激综合征儿科患者的积极作用和不良反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Can-herbal-remedies-spices-and-dietary-fibres-offer- effective-treatment-options-for-children-with-irritable-bowel-syndrome- (IBS).aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Can-herbal-remedies-spices-and-dietary-fibres-offer- effective-treatment-options-for-children-with-irritable-bowel-syndrome- (IBS).aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd695ebc-599f-472c-8197-2d2d1185771f Mon, 16 Oct 2023 05:49:00 -0400 Can herbal remedies, spices, and dietary fibers offer effective treatment options for children with irritable bowel syndrome (IBS)?
Antiverse 和 GlobalBio, Inc. 扩大合作以推进抗体癌症治疗Antiverse Ltd (Antiverse) 和 GlobalBio, Inc. (GlobalBio) 今天宣布，他们将扩大合作，以推进免疫检查点抑制剂在癌症治疗中的应用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Antiverse-and-GlobalBio-Inc-extend-collaboration-to-advance-antibody-cancer-therapeutics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/Antiverse-and-GlobalBio-Inc-extend-collaboration-to-advance-antibody-cancer-therapeutics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2af5a337-bdb0-4947-b84b-696b461e313b Mon, 16 Oct 2023 04:54:00 -0400 Antiverse and GlobalBio, Inc. extend collaboration to advance antibody cancer therapeutics
营养如何影响骨关节炎的预防和管理？营养对骨关节炎（OA）的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/How-does-nutrition-influence-osteoarthritis-prevention-and-management.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/How-does-nutrition-influence-osteoarthritis-prevention-and-management.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d1b14630-db77-4571-a86e-6a652223aec0 Mon, 16 Oct 2023 04:32:00 -0400 How does nutrition influence osteoarthritis prevention and management?
New Picus® 2 为连接电子移液器树立了新标准Sartorius 推出新型电子移液器 Picus 2。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/The-New-Picusc2ae-2-sets-a-new-standard-for-connected-electric-pipettes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231016/The-New-Picusc2ae-2-sets-a-new-standard-for-connected-electric-pipettes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ac082275-5a33-4a0f-adc7-49c366512db0 Mon, 16 Oct 2023 03:33:00 -0400 The New Picus® 2 sets a new standard for connected electronic pipettes
研究发现阿片类药物使用障碍治疗可降低手术后用药过量的风险尽管患有阿片类药物使用障碍 (OUD) 的人比没有患阿片类药物使用障碍的人在大手术后更有可能服用过量或出现并发症，但在手术前使用药物治疗阿片类药物使用障碍 (OUD) 可能会消除这种额外风险。 -在 2023 年麻醉学年会上提出的同类研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231015/Opioid-use-disorder-treatment-lowers-risk-of-overdose-after-surgery-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231015/Opioid-use-disorder-treatment-lowers-risk-of-overdose-after-surgery-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=68236e32-9550-4bbd-b770-2877508eb11c Sun, 15 Oct 2023 23:32:48 -0400 Opioid use disorder treatment lowers risk of overdose after surgery, study finds
手术结果中的种族和民族差异会导致生命损失2023 年麻醉学年会上公布的一项针对超过 150 万例住院手术的研究表明，如果接受手术的美国人之间没有种族和民族差异，过去 20 年来手术后死亡的约 12,000 名黑人和西班牙裔患者可能会活下来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231015/Racial-and-ethnic-disparities-in-surgical-outcomes-cost-lives.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231015/Racial-and-ethnic-disparities-in-surgical-outcomes-cost-lives.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=942e759e-e23c-4422-b4a8-b2699330c20c Sun, 15 Oct 2023 23:30:08 -0400 Racial and ethnic disparities in surgical outcomes cost lives
